db:abstract.db:para: Represents particles manipulated by emitters and affectors.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Particle elements are always managed internally by the ParticleSystem and cannot be created in QML. However, sometimes they are exposed via signals so as to allow arbitrary changes to the particle state

db:section.db:title: alpha : real
db:section.db:para: ImageParticle can draw colorized particles. When it does so, alpha is used as the alpha channel of the color applied to the source image.
Values are from 0.0 to 1.0.

db:section.db:title: autoRotate : bool
db:section.db:para: If autoRotate is true, then the particle's rotation will be set so that it faces the direction of travel, plus any rotation from the rotation or rotationVelocity properties.

db:section.db:title: ax : real
db:section.db:para: The current x acceleration of the particle.

db:section.db:title: ay : real
db:section.db:para: The current y acceleration of the particle.

db:section.db:title: blue : real
db:section.db:para: ImageParticle can draw colorized particles. When it does so, blue is used as the blue channel of the color applied to the source image.
Values are from 0.0 to 1.0.

db:section.db:title: currentSize : real
db:section.db:para: The currentSize of the particle, interpolating between startSize and endSize based on the currentTime.

db:section.db:title: endSize : real
db:section.db:para: The size in pixels that the particle image is at the end of its life. If this value is less than 0, then it is disregarded and the particle will have its startSize for the entire lifetime.

db:section.db:title: green : real
db:section.db:para: ImageParticle can draw colorized particles. When it does so, green is used as the green channel of the color applied to the source image.
Values are from 0.0 to 1.0.

db:section.db:title: initialAX : real
db:section.db:para: The x acceleration of the particle at the beginning of its lifetime.

The method of simulation prefers to have the initial values changed, rather than determining and changing the value at a given time. Change initial values in CustomEmitters instead of the current values.

db:section.db:title: initialAY : real
db:section.db:para: The y acceleration of the particle at the beginning of its lifetime.

The method of simulation prefers to have the initial values changed, rather than determining and changing the value at a given time. Change initial values in CustomEmitters instead of the current values.

db:section.db:title: initialVX : real
db:section.db:para: The x velocity of the particle at the beginning of its lifetime.

The method of simulation prefers to have the initial values changed, rather than determining and changing the value at a given time. Change initial values in CustomEmitters instead of the current values.

db:section.db:title: initialVY : real
db:section.db:para: The y velocity of the particle at the beginning of its lifetime.

The method of simulation prefers to have the initial values changed, rather than determining and changing the value at a given time. Change initial values in CustomEmitters instead of the current values.

db:section.db:title: initialX : real
db:section.db:para: The x coordinate of the particle at the beginning of its lifetime.

The method of simulation prefers to have the initial values changed, rather than determining and changing the value at a given time. Change initial values in CustomEmitters instead of the current values.

db:section.db:title: initialY : real
db:section.db:para: The y coordinate of the particle at the beginning of its lifetime.

The method of simulation prefers to have the initial values changed, rather than determining and changing the value at a given time. Change initial values in CustomEmitters instead of the current values.

db:section.db:title: lifeLeft : real
db:section.db:para: The time in seconds that the particle has left to live at the current point in time.

db:section.db:title: lifeSpan : real
db:section.db:para: The time in seconds that the particle will live for.

db:section.db:title: red : real
db:section.db:para: ImageParticle can draw colorized particles. When it does so, red is used as the red channel of the color applied to the source image.
Values are from 0.0 to 1.0.

db:section.db:title: rotation : real
db:section.db:para: Degrees clockwise that the particle image is rotated at the beginning of its life.

db:section.db:title: rotationVelocity : real
db:section.db:para: Degrees clockwise per second that the particle image is rotated at while alive.

db:section.db:title: startSize : real
db:section.db:para: The size in pixels that the particle image is at the start of its life.

db:section.db:title: t : real
db:section.db:para: The time, in seconds since the beginning of the simulation, that the particle was born.

db:section.db:title: update : bool
db:section.db:para: Inside an Affector, the changes made to the particle will only be applied if update is set to true.

db:section.db:title: vx : real
db:section.db:para: The current x velocity of the particle.

db:section.db:title: vy : real
db:section.db:para: The current y velocity of the particle.

db:section.db:title: x : real
db:section.db:para: The current x coordinate of the particle.

db:section.db:title: xDeformationVectorX : real
db:section.db:para: The x component of the deformation vector along the X axis. ImageParticle can draw particles across non-square shapes. It will draw the texture rectangle across the parallelogram drawn with the x and y deformation vectors.

db:section.db:title: xDeformationVectorY : real
db:section.db:para: The x component of the deformation vector along the X axis. ImageParticle can draw particles across non-square shapes. It will draw the texture rectangle across the parallelogram drawn with the x and y deformation vectors.

db:section.db:title: y : real
db:section.db:para: The current y coordinate of the particle.

db:section.db:title: yDeformationVectorX : real
db:section.db:para: The y component of the deformation vector along the X axis. ImageParticle can draw particles across non-square shapes. It will draw the texture rectangle across the parallelogram drawn with the x and y deformation vectors.

db:section.db:title: yDeformationVectorY : real
db:section.db:para: The y component of the deformation vector along the Y axis. ImageParticle can draw particles across non-square shapes. It will draw the texture rectangle across the parallelogram drawn with the x and y deformation vectors.
